data.actual_result: The AFK message from Clyde is sent.
data.expected_result: The AFK message from Clyde should not be sent.
data.short_description: Leaving a call by closing the respective DM does not stop Clyde's AFK message from being sent, after being reopened.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a call with another friend. - Get them to leave the call. - Close the DM the call is in, and then reopen it (using the Friends tab) - Wait 5 minutes for the timeout message. - Clyde will send the timeout message.
